item.title: Shots fired at Border Patrol agents in Little Village, DHS says

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Nov. 9)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: Salt-N-Pepa, Outkast among Rock & Roll Hall of Fame's newest inductees
item.description: The 2025 Rock & Roll Hall of Fame class included Warren Zevon, Bad Company, Salt-N-Pepa, Outkast, Cyndi Lauper and The White Stripes.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.
